name: HometownRadio1400KFTM
0:
”Alexa, play hometown radio fourteen hundred k. f. t. m.”
”Alexa, open hometown radio fourteen hundred k. f. t. m.”
”Alexa, start hometown radio fourteen hundred k. f. t. m.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hometown radio fourteen hundred k. f. t. m.
des:
Listen to Hometown Radio 1400 KFTM on your Amazon device(s)!

Once you've enabled the skill, saying "Alexa, OPEN hometown radio fourteen hundred k. f. t. m." gets you right in.

Established in Morgan County in 1949. Home of the Big Morning Show. Radio Voice of the Fort Morgan Mustangs.
